## RumInitConfiguration.traceSampleRate property

The percentage of requests to trace: 100 for all, 0 for none. See <a href="https://docs.datadoghq.com/real_user_monitoring/platform/connect_rum_and_traces/?tab=browserrum">Connect RUM and Traces</a> for further information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
traceSampleRate?: number | undefined;
```
